law.catch_line: Unless a medical laboratory has a valid license, no other person on the laboratory's behalf may:...
law.text:
Unless a medical laboratory has a valid license, no other person on the laboratory's behalf may:
Offer or perform medical laboratory tests or examinations in this State;
Offer or perform medical laboratory tests or examinations on specimens acquired from health care providers in this State at the medical laboratory located outside this State; or
Represent or service in this State the medical laboratory regardless of the laboratory's location.
